A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: While being a Star Wars film in its current era it is expected to be a great film. Unfortunately\, it’s not the case here. After seeing TFA 2 years ago\, I left being blown away and wanting more. With TLJ\, I kind of was wondering most of the time where the story is headed. Don’t get me wrong\, there were some AWESOME scenes\, but were then offset with events where I was left scratching my head at. Judge for yourself but personally I thought it was disappointing.
